name: Men's 'Moto Mesh' Utility Bag • Handmade industrial mesh + vintage style striping
description:
The MOTO MESH mens utility bag was designed for my husband...
inspired by his love for vintage cafe racers.

Extremely lightweight, multi-purpose w/superior strength! Handles excess weight of tools, moto parts, helmets, leathers & laundry. Carry your MOTO MESH utility bag often: motorcycle, scooter, bike, car, bus, boat or plane. Folds flat or rollup & stow away in your moto case, suitcase or trunk!  

FEATURES
• Sustainable zero waste design.
• Superior strength: woven Industrial Safety Netting (commercial construction grade) 
• All enclosed seams for superior strength.
• Large interior hang zip pocket: secure wallet, iPad/tablet, accessories. 
• Weather proof: rain or shine, sleet or snow.
• Vintage style striping adds bonus visibility.
• Vegan 

MATERIALS
• Fabric: woven industrial safety netting (commercial construction grade) entire fabric width, including selvedge edges + no horizontal cuts. All-enclosed seams for superior strength.
• Interior zip pocket: bound w/polypro webbing. 
• Zipper: USA nylon zipper & nickel pull.
• USA thread: UVR/abrasion resistant bonded T90 polyester. 
• Adjustable Strap: heavyweight 1.5"w blk polypro webbing adapts from 16’’shoulder drop to 36’’(cross-body length).
• Hardware: high stength acetal plastic. Aluminum carabiner & nickel key ring included.
• Vegan 

DIMENSIONS
15”h x 14”w x 6"d • Inside pocket: 10”h x 11”w

made in usa • limited edition • only 3 left!
 
Suggested cleaning: Simply rinse under cool water by hand only & mild soap if necessary & line dry.

description:
C.I.T.Y. D.E.N.I.M Collection

Our handmade DK COURIER raw denim shoulder bag was designed for a one of a kind, modern gal who loves simplicity, clean lines and carries fewer accessories. Functional slender styling... comfortable for everyday! Featuring 6 multipurpose pockets. Distinctive colorful print interiors exclusive to each bag!

MATERIALS

- Interior: fully lined, exclusive 100% cotton print, hand finished.

name: Utility Bag • 'MBK MESH' Carryall Bag • Handmade industrial woven mesh
description:
Green Garage Studio Original... one of our most adaptable use bags.
The MBK MESH Mens Utility Bag is the ultimate in everyday utility!
Super sized, extremely lightweight & durable, all weather... paragon for daily activities: gym, sports, farmers & flea markets, groceries, shopping, library, gardening, camping, tools, riding, picnics, pools + ideal vacation beach bag... the sand filters through the fine open weave.
Duel duty... laundry bag!

Carry your MBK Mesh utility bag often... car, boat, plane, bus, bike, scooter or motorcycle! Folds flat, rollup & stow away in your suitcase, car, truck or moto case! 

FEATURES
• Black woven Industrial Safety Netting (commercial construction grade) 
• Sustainable zero waste design (using entire width of fabric including selvedge edges with no horizontal cuts)
• All enclosed seams for superior strength.
• Large interior hang zip pocket: secure spot to stash your wallet,  iPad/notebook + key clip.
• Weather proof in rain or shine, sleet or snow.
• Vegan 

MATERIALS
• Interior pocket: bound w/polypro webbing. Made in USA nylon zipper, nickel pull.
• USA thread: superior UVR/abrasion resistant bonded polyester. 
• Adjustable strap: 1.5"w blk high-strength polypro webbing adapts from 16’’shoulder drop to 36’’(cross-body length).
• Hardware: high stength acetal plastic. Aluminum carabiner & nickel key ring included.

DIMENSIONS
15”h x 12”w x 6"d • Inside pocket: 12” x 12”
reg. $72  made in usa 
 
Suggested cleaning: Simply rinse under cool water by hand only, mild soap if necessary & line dry.
